data.event: The name 'Bangor' was selected in 1895 by the land's owner, a farmer named Owen Jones, after his birthplace Bangor in Wales.

event.title: changed the suburb name to Menai in 1910

data.event: To avoid confusion with Bangor in Tasmania, the Postmaster General's Office changed the suburb name to Menai in 1910.
When Menai expanded, the eastern section was renamed Bangor in 1976.
